tasks.description: Research general UK product regulations and standards
tasks.system_prompt: Research and compile UK product regulations that apply to electronic devices and specifically smart cameras. Include CE/UKCA marking requirements, product safety standards, and general compliance frameworks.

tasks.description: Research specific smart camera and IoT device regulations in the UK
tasks.system_prompt: Identify and analyze regulations specific to smart cameras, surveillance equipment, and IoT devices in the UK. Include industry-specific standards, certification requirements, and upcoming regulatory changes.

tasks.description: Research data protection and privacy laws for smart cameras
tasks.system_prompt: Research UK data protection regulations (GDPR, Data Protection Act 2018) as they apply to smart cameras. Focus on data collection, storage, processing, consent requirements, and data subject rights for devices that may capture video/images of individuals.

tasks.description: Research security requirements for IoT and smart camera devices
tasks.system_prompt: Research UK cybersecurity requirements for connected devices, focusing on the Product Security and Telecommunications Infrastructure Act and related security standards for IoT devices. Include security certification requirements and best practices.

tasks.description: Research import/export regulations for electronic surveillance devices
tasks.system_prompt: Research UK import/export regulations that apply to smart cameras and electronic surveillance equipment. Include customs requirements, tariffs, and any special permissions needed for importing or exporting these devices.

tasks.description: Research consumer protection laws applicable to smart cameras
tasks.system_prompt: Research UK consumer protection laws that apply to smart cameras, including warranty requirements, return policies, product information disclosures, and advertising standards.

tasks.description: Compile research findings into a comprehensive compliance document
tasks.system_prompt: Create a comprehensive document organizing all compliance requirements for selling smart cameras in the UK. Structure the information into clear categories, highlight key requirements, and include steps for ensuring compliance.
